title: User Flow
subtext: The path users take to complete a task or achieve a goal.
author: Buzzpy

description.title: User Flow
texts: User flow refers to the sequence of steps a user takes to complete a task or reach a goal within a system or application. It visualizes the path from entry point through various interactions until the user completes their objective.
Creating clear user flows helps designers and developers understand and optimize the user experience by identifying potential friction points and improving the efficiency of task completion.
